description: This source file defines a health check route for a Flask application using Flask-Smorest. It creates a Blueprint and a view for a health check endpoint returning a simple JSON message.

classes.name: HealthCheck
classes.description: A Flask MethodView class that provides a health check endpoint returning a 'Healthy' message.

methods.name: get(self)
methods.description: Handles GET requests to the health check endpoint, returning a JSON message indicating the server is healthy.

ctags.name: blp
ctags.pattern: /^blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/

fields.name: blp = Blueprint("Healt Check", "health check", url_prefix="\/", description="Health check route"/
